title: Nimbus L‑Sectional Sofa
description: Spacious L‑shaped sectional upholstered in a stain‑resistant linen blend. Seats up to six comfortably.

title: Aranya Teak TV Console
description: Hand‑joined solid‑teak media console with rattan sliding shutters and cable‑management ports.

title: Kashmir Walnut Coffee Table
description: Live‑edge walnut top on matte‑black hairpin legs—each piece showcases unique grain patterns.

title: Indigo Velvet Accent Chair
description: Plush accent chair with channel‑tufted backrest and solid‑ash frame, finished in a deep indigo velvet.

title: Udaipur Mirror with Jali Work
description: Hand‑carved mango‑wood frame featuring traditional Rajasthani jali lattice. Wall‑mount hardware included.

title: Sutra Rattan Side Table
description: Lightweight yet sturdy cane‑weave side table with concealed storage for remotes and magazines.

title: Mysuru Rosewood Bookshelf
description: Five‑tier open bookshelf crafted from sustainably‑sourced Indian rosewood with adjustable shelves.

title: Calm Recliner Lounger
description: Ergonomic push‑back recliner with high‑density foam and breathable faux‑leather upholstery.

title: Sangam Nesting Tables — Set of 2
description: Space‑saving nesting tables in contrasting acacia and white‑oak veneer. Use together or apart.
